solution_line_template: If Zack decided to give his three friends {marbles_per_friend} marbles each, he gave them {num_friends}*{marbles_per_friend}=<<{num_friends}*{marbles_per_friend}={marbles_given_to_friends}>>{marbles_given_to_friends} marbles.
If he kept five, Zack initially had {marbles_given_to_friends}+{marbles_kept}=<<{marbles_given_to_friends}+{marbles_kept}={initial_marbles}>>{initial_marbles} marbles.
